results.text: You try to melt into the background to avoid detection, but you’re drawing too much attention. For the next minute creatures have advantage on checks made to find you.

Your attempts to stay hidden have started playing tricks on you mentally, making you feel like you’re always being followed. You are On Edge (Trials & Treasures page 362) until you complete a long rest.
You stepped in something foul-smelling and you can’t seem to shake it. Until you take an hour to bathe and wash your clothing, you have disadvantage on all Stealth checks.
You’re so focused on staying quiet yourself that you didn’t notice someone else sneaking up on you. You are surprised for the next round.
You trip over something: a rock, uneven ground, or even your own feet. You are immediately knocked prone and alert any creatures within 15 feet to your presence.
Your allergies picked a bad time to manifest, causing you to sneeze loudly. You are rattled until the start of your next turn.
